main event: An observer reported seeing a hovering silvery ball in Leticia, Colombia, on June 5, 1962.
interesting points: The object was described as a ball over 3 feet in diameter,The object hovered for 5 minutes before disappearing at high speed,The report was classified as insufficient for evaluation,Several people confirmed seeing the object at a lower altitude of about thirty feet,The sighting was noted in the archives of Project Blue Book.
